item.title: Inox India Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: Inox India Ltd has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting deteriorating momentum and raising concerns about the stock's long-term strength amid a challenging market backdrop. Time: 5 minutes ago

item.title: Robust Quarterly Earnings Drive Market Optimism as 72 Stocks Report Dec-2025 Results
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has delivered a mixed yet encouraging picture, with 72 companies reporting results. While large caps showed restrained positive momentum, mid and small caps outperformed significantly, signalling a shift in market dynamics and sectoral strength as investors digest the latest financial disclosures. Time: 6 minutes ago

item.title: Pavna Industries Ltd Stock Hits 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Downtrend
item.description: Pavna Industries Ltd, a player in the Auto Components & Equipments sector, recorded a fresh 52-week low of Rs.19.28 today, marking a significant decline in its stock price amid persistent downward momentum and underperformance relative to its sector and broader market indices. Time: 1 hour ago
